column6:
Ultimatum tie-in!,2009,2
The hits just KEEP ON COMING! Just when our waterlogged webslinger thought things couldn't get any worse, Spidey
finds himself face-to-face with none other than the HULK! PLUS Spider-Woman, Daredevil, and Doctor Strange amidst the destruction... and not everyone lives to see the next issue...!
Rated A ...$2.99
